headerMobile.description: Navigate through the menu to explore our services.

firstCard.title: Comprehensive Approach
firstCard.description: We work with your preferences in mind: creating custom designs, selecting shape and color based on skin type and anatomy. Comfort and safety are our priorities at every stage, whether it's a tattoo, permanent makeup, or piercing.

secondCard.title: Experience and Comfort
secondCard.description: We work with your preferences in mind: creating custom designs, selecting shape and color based on skin type and anatomy. Comfort and safety are our priorities at every stage, whether it's a tattoo, permanent makeup, or piercing.

thirdCard.title: Growth and Learning
thirdCard.description: Want to become an artist? Training at Trinkotattoo includes hands-on practice on models, a flexible schedule, experienced instructors, and an internationally recognized diploma. Gain not just knowledge, but a profession.
